title: AGA - Chicken and sausage pasta bake with sneaky veggy sauce
ingredients: ['4 chicken breast fillets', '8 sausages', '3 mugs of dried pasta tubes', '2 carrots', '1 parsnip', '1 green pepper', '1 courgette', '1 can of chopped tomatoes', 'Chicken stock cube', 'A teaspoon of lazy (finely chopped garlic)', '1/2 a small glass of port or red wine', 'A squirt of tomatoe puree']
